Created an attachment (id=22631)
patch test.xml to call SessionTests as uitestapplication

The SessionTests were being run as coretestapplication and the workbench based
tests were failing.  SessionTests is now called the same way UITestSuite is
called.

All of the platform UI tests ran at 100%.
